member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.PowerShellExecutor.Controllers.PowerShellExecutorController
member.summary: Execute PowerShell scripts and return the results. Allows AI to execute PowerShell scripts on the local machine. Use this API with caution due to security risks.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.PowerShellExecutor.Controllers.PowerShellExecutorController.ExecuteScript(System.String)
member.param: The PowerShell script to be executed.
member.returns: The output of the executed PowerShell script.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing scripts received via API due to security risks.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.PowerShellExecutor.PowerShellExecutorHelper.RunPowerShellScript(System.String)
member.param: The PowerShell script to be executed.
member.returns: The output of the executed PowerShell script.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing scripts received via API due to security risks.
